name: BOOP (Samoe)
description:
BOOP - A game made in 7 days for the Bored Pixels Jam #7 Boop is a video game about dashing, beeping, and booping. Attempt to reach the highest score you can within 5 minutes by dashing and smashing your way through cubes and randomly generated levels! The map is different every time you restart so no two rounds are ever exactly the same! FEATURES:
  • Unique 3D Pixel Art
  • Randomly generated levels
  • Two powerful attacks
  • Homing dashes that chain into each other
  • All the game "juice" you've come to know and love
  • Beeps and boops :)
CONTROLS:
  • W - A - S - D : Movement
  • Space : Dash
  • Q : Switch Abilities

This game took a lot out of me. Before this, I had never finished a game by myself, let alone one in such a short amount of time. I've been learning Unreal Engine for a little over 6 months now, and this project was a wonderful way to showcase the work I've put in and knowledge I've acquired while also giving me clear indication as to what areas I need to improve in. Thank you for taking the time to check it out! PLEASE don't hesitate to share your high scores with me in an itch.io comment or a tweet!
